title: Cheese and Broccoli Calzones
ingredients: ['315ml warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '550g strong bread flour', '2 1/2 teaspoons dried active dry', '284g chopped frozen broccoli, thawed', '1/4 teaspoon of garlic powder or crushed garlic', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '65g provolone or Italian cheese, grated', '40g Parmesan cheese', '55g grated mozzarella cheese', '125g ricotta cheese', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
